DOC.detailed_description: 2 group patient study : first group , depress patient history suicide attempt include whereas second group , depress patient without history suicide attempt include . For group , cognitive inhibition assess trough eye tracker task ( antisaccade ) . Both group also compare neuropsychological characteristic quality social interaction participant .
